description: A sarcastic Soul Reaper who is assigned hollow extermination duties in Ichigo`s hometown. Though her physical appearance is that of a teenage girl, in reality she is around 150 years old. At the opening of the story, Rukia is forced to transfer her powers to Ichigo and assume a temporary lifestyle as a regular human. She registers at the local high school and takes up residence in Ichigo`s closet, while teaching him how to be a substitute Soul Reaper in her place.
name: Kuchiki Rukia
